total_batches: Number of batches to train in total.
gather_episodes: Number of consecutive episodes to gather data.
save_weights_freq: Frequency (batches) of saving the agent weights during traning.
log_loss_freq: Frequency (batches) of logging the train losses.
test_freq: Frequency (batches) of testing and logging the agent performance.
test_episodes: How many episodes to test and take average return.
